text: Platyspermation is a genus of plant in family Alseuosmiaceae. The genus contains a single species, Platyspermation crassifolium, and is endemic to New Caledonia.Kadereit, J.W., Jeffrey, C., & Kubitzki, K. (eds). The Families and Genera of Vascular Plants, Volume VIII: Flowering Plants: Eudicots: Asterales. Berlin: Springer, 2007. 11. ==References== Category:Alseuosmiaceae Category:Endemic flora of New Caledonia Category:Near threatened plants Category:Near threatened biota of Oceania Category:Monotypic Asterales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Platyspermation
